name: Balloon Rush (cocapasteque, dalon9)
description:
Balloon Rush

Embark on a journey through deadly saws and flamethrowers in the sky and help the cute cat with its hot air balloon to reach the finish line.

Balloon Rush is a puzzle game where you place fans across the levels and control a hot air balloon. Blow air on the balloon to move it across the levels without touching the deadly saws and avoiding the flamethrowers. You don't want the cute cat to die or explode in a horrible death, don't you?

Controls

You can a play a short tutorial in the game to learn about the controls.
- [LEFT CLICK]: Place a fan
- [HOLD LEFT CLICK]: Move a fan
- [ESCAPE]: Pause/Menu
- Use the sliders in the control panel to adjust angle and strength of the fans.

Features
  • 12 fully playable levels + a tutorial
  • Leaderboard per level
  • Configurable sound level
  • A cute cat in a balloon
Leaderboard

Our game uses a leaderboard system, try to be the best and reach the top 3. Beat the level the fastest possible and try to use less fans than expected.
